subject: Marketing
title: Generational Marketing
description: A short lesson to help you apply Generational Marketing.

hook.text: Boomers trust TV ads. Gen Z trusts TikTok creators. Same product, different planets.

buildup.text: Each generation was shaped by different technology, events, and economic realities.

discovery.text: These shared experiences create cohort-wide preferences for channels, tones, and values.

twist.text: But generations aren't monoliths. A 65-year-old gamer and a 20-year-old banker both exist.

climax.text: The best approach: use generational insights as a starting point, then personalize.
